languages.text: "Позор-то, конечно, позор, но будь он трусом, давно бы уже лазружье в канаву швырнул и пятками сверкал куда подальше. А он вон, вас ведет, долг исполняет, хоть и зубами чутка стучит".

traits.locale_text: "Позор-то, конечно, позор, но будь он трусом давно бы уже лазган в канаву швырнул и пятками сверкал куда подальше. А он вон, вас ведет, долг исполняет, хоть и зубами чутка стучит".

languages.text: "It certainly is, but if he were a coward, he'd have chucked his lasgun in a ditch long ago and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."
languages.original_text: "Позор-то, конечно, позор, но будь он трусом, давно бы уже лазружье в канаву швырнул и пятками сверкал куда подальше. А он вон, вас ведет, долг исполняет, хоть и зубами чутка стучит".

traits.locale_text: "It sure is a shame, but if he had been a coward, he'd have long chucked his lasgun in a ditch and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you, doing his duty, never mind that his teeth are chattering a little."

"It sure is a shame, but if he had been a coward, he'd have long chucked his lasgun in a ditch and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you, doing his duty, never mind that his teeth are chattering a little."
"It sure is a shame, but if he were a coward, he'd have long chucked his lasgun in a ditch and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."
"It sure is a shame, but if he were a coward, he'd have long chucked his lasgun in a ditch and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."
"It certainly is, but if he were a coward, he'd have chucked his lasgun in a ditch long ago and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."
"It certainly is, but if he were a coward, he'd have chucked his lasgun in a ditch long ago and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."

languages.text: "Es ist wirklich ein Jammer, doch wenn er ein Feigling wäre, hätte er sein Lasergewehr längst in einen Graben geworfen und wäre davongelaufen. Doch hier ist er, zeigt Euch den Weg und tut seine Pflicht, trotz seiner klappernden Zähne."
languages.original_text: "It certainly is, but if he were a coward, he'd have chucked his lasgun in a ditch long ago and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist wirklich ein Jammer, doch wenn er ein Feigling wäre, hätte er sein Lasergewehr längst in einen Graben geworfen und wäre davongelaufen. Doch hier ist er, zeigt Euch den Weg und tut seine Pflicht, trotz seiner klappernden Zähne."

languages.text: « Je ne dis pas le contraire, mais si c'était un lâche, il se serait débarrassé de son fusil laser depuis longtemps et il aurait décampé. Pourtant, il est là, à vous guider et à faire son devoir, malgré sa trouille. »
languages.original_text: "It certainly is, but if he were a coward, he'd have chucked his lasgun in a ditch long ago and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."

traits.locale_text: « C'est une honte, c'est certain, mais si c'était un lâche, il se serait débarrassé de son fusil laser depuis longtemps et il aurait décampé. Pourtant, il est là, à vous guider et à faire son devoir, malgré sa trouille. »

languages.text: “怯懦确实可耻，但如果他真的是个懦夫，他老早就把枪扔进阴沟里，一个人跑掉了。可你看，即便他吓得牙齿打颤，他还留在这里，为你指路，履行他的职责。”
languages.original_text: "It certainly is, but if he were a coward, he'd have chucked his lasgun in a ditch long ago and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."

traits.locale_text: “怯懦确实可耻，但如果他真的是个懦夫，他早就把枪扔进沟里，自己跑掉了。可你看，即便他吓得牙齿打颤，他还留在这里，为你指路，履行他的职责。”

languages.text: 「確かにそうですが、もし彼が臆病者だったら、彼はとっくにラスガンを溝に捨て、逃げ出しているはずです。それでも彼はここにいて、あなたを導き、自分の職務を果たしています。己の震える歯を気にもとめずに」
languages.original_text: "It certainly is, but if he were a coward, he'd have chucked his lasgun in a ditch long ago and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに残念ですが、もし彼が臆病者だったら、彼は既にラスガンを溝に捨て、逃げ出しているはずです。それでも彼はここにいて、あなたを導き、自分の職務を果たしています。己の震える歯を気にもとめずに」

languages.text: «Desde luego, pero si fuera un cobarde, hace tiempo que habría tirado su pistola láser a una zanja y habría echado a correr. Sin embargo, ahí está, guiándole y cumpliendo con su deber, sin importarle el castañeteo de sus dientes».
languages.original_text: "It certainly is, but if he were a coward, he'd have chucked his lasgun in a ditch long ago and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."

traits.locale_text: «Es una pena, pero si fuera un cobarde, hace tiempo que habría tirado su pistola láser a una zanja y habría echado a correr. Sin embargo, ahí está, guiándoos y cumpliendo con su deber, sin importarle el castañeteo de sus dientes».

languages.text: "Yakışmadığı doğru. Ancak korkak olsaydı çoktan silazerini kuytu bir köşeye atıp tabanları yağlamıştı. Oysa karşımızda, bize yol gösterip görevini yapıyor. Korkudan üç buçuk atsa bile."
languages.original_text: "It certainly is, but if he were a coward, he'd have chucked his lasgun in a ditch long ago and taken to his heels. Yet there he is, leading you and doing his duty, never mind his chattering teeth."

traits.locale_text: "Yakışmadığı doğru. Ancak korkak olsaydı çoktan lazer silahını kuytu bir köşeye atıp tabanları yağlamıştı. Oysa karşımızda, bize yol gösterip görevini yapıyor. Korkudan üç buçuk atsa bile."
